title: I have 94 project tokens, I want to convert them all into blue essence
body: I will need to click forge 94 times? I wish there would be an option to merge more than once

replies.body: Ahhh that does kinda suck, but I think you'll just have to click the forging 94 times O_O....betta get some snacks
They have the option to 10 chests at a time. Not sure why they wouldn't do that for the tokens as well.

I personally would consider unlocking the border, if you haven't done so already. It's a limited reward that most likely won't be made available again in the future. I do however agree that an option to do X many things at a time would be nice for these type of stuff.
